extended_metaphor.metaphor: both Mechanical Energy in energy and Pitching velocity in baseball have the ability to quantify the object's ability to perform work and store energy based on its motion and position within a force field
extended_metaphor.mechanical_energy: Mechanical Energy combines kinetic and potential energy to provide a comprehensive measure of the object's mechanical capabilities.
extended_metaphor.pitching_velocity: Pitching velocity in baseball combines the kinetic energy generated by the pitcher's mechanics and the potential energy stored in the pitcher's body position to deliver a powerful and effective throw towards the batter.
